definition: arteries and veins/vein (on a leaf, insect wing etc)
thoroughfare/to go straight ahead/to rush/to clash

sentences.english: A decade ago, he says, very little was known about any connections between pulsars and magnetars.
sentences.chinese: 10年前，我們對脈衝星和磁星的關聯知之甚少。

sentences.english: And so here you have the data on the Crab Pulsar.
sentences.chinese: 這是蟹狀星雲脈衝星的數據。

sentences.english: Did all magnetars originate as pulsars?
sentences.chinese: 是否所有磁星的形成都起源於脈衝星？

sentences.english: Interest was renewed in the astronomical community with the discovery of pulsars.
sentences.chinese: 天文學團體隨着脈衝星的發現重新激發了興趣。

sentences.english: We use a three dimensional pulsar magnetosphere model to study the geometry of outer- magnetospheric gaps.
sentences.chinese: 利用三維脈衝星磁層模型研究了磁層外隙的幾何結構。

sentences.english: The Crab Pulsar is slowing down.
